bug.author: KellyZhang2020
bug.summary: How can I convert pytorch pretrained bert model to onnx model
bug.description:
When I convert the pytorch pretrained bert model to onnx model as follows: <denchmark-code>import os import torch from pytorch_pretrained_bert import BertTokenizer, BertModel
model = BertModel.from_pretrained('bert-base-uncased')
input_1 = torch.LongTensor(1, 14) input_2 = torch.LongTensor(1, 14) input_3 = torch.LongTensor(1, 14) base_path = os.path.dirname(__file__) onnx_path = os.path.join(base_path, 'bert.onnx') torch.onnx.export(model, (input_1, input_2, input_3), onnx_path) </denchmark-code>
raise error: IndexError: index out of range in self
transformers version: 3.0.2 Platform: pycharm Python version: 3.8 PyTorch version (GPU?): 1.6.0 no GPU onnx version: 1.7.0 pytorch-pretrained-bert version: 0.6.2
How can I convert pytorch pretrained bert model to onnx modelï¼Ÿ Thank you for the help :)

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/KellyZhang2020>@KellyZhang2020</denchmark-link> try following the sample at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/huggingface/transformers/blob/master/notebooks/04-onnx-export.ipynb>https://github.com/huggingface/transformers/blob/master/notebooks/04-onnx-export.ipynb</denchmark-link> . More details at <denchmark-link:https://medium.com/microsoftazure/accelerate-your-nlp-pipelines-using-hugging-face-transformers-and-onnx-runtime-2443578f4333>https://medium.com/microsoftazure/accelerate-your-nlp-pipelines-using-hugging-face-transformers-and-onnx-runtime-2443578f4333</denchmark-link> .
